name: Fire Suppressor
description: Various types of fire extinguishers. Most often found as compressed gas tanks that operate either by spraying a heavy gas or a foaming agent. Higher TL versions may utilize more radical methods to extinguish a fire. It should also be noted that some classes of fire, such as electrical or chemical fires, require a specific type suppressant in order to extinguish them.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
